div.p: We are extremely grateful to David Davis and the Davis family at the Davistead Dairy Farm, Langley, British Columbia, for their continuing generous field support of our starling research. We would like to thank the many field assistants who helped collect data over the 13 years of this project, Philip Gienapp and Martijn van de Pol for providing R-code, and Marcel Visser for useful discussions on this paper.
